Hydras:

"I like the idea"hissed Hydras"We should develop it more, Reclusa.=
.. Maybe, I can add a special errand in this idea"
  ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
  From: Dark Mouse 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, A=
pril 22, 2005 9:56 PM
  Subject: Re: Reclusa



  Reclusa::

  She took a s=
tep forward and smiled, holding her head up and keeping
  her form rigid, "=
I said, if only there was a way to have them deat
  each other. We would be=
 rid of both at once, not having to forsake a
  single bot on the venture. =
 If only there was a way to con those goody
  goodies into believing that s=
elf sacrifice was the only way. Perhaps
  even going so far as to have them=
 reprogrammed into doing so. Someone
  could perhaps sneak into thier base =
and reprogram thier cr chambers.
  Inserting a program to which they must o=
bey and in killing Unicron get
  themselves killed in the process. Killing =
two bots with one shot, as
  it were."
